alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 10:21PM CDT until April 20 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BANDERA AND WEST CENTRAL KERR COUNTIES... At 1020 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Kerr Wildlife Management Area, or 17 miles north of Vanderpool, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kerr Wildlife Management Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
